description: React component ConnectConfluenceButton that initiates OAuth flow with Confluence by fetching an authorization URL from backend and redirecting the user.

methods.name: ConnectConfluenceButton
methods.description: React functional component that renders a button to trigger Confluence OAuth flow.

methods.name: handleClick
methods.description: Event handler that invokes fetchOAuthAuthorizeUrl and navigates to the authorization URL; manages loading state and error handling.
